item.title: Admin11 etc. Crashing server. New SYK
item.dc:creator: @I_PK_Pigeons I PK Pigeons
item.description:
@I_PK_Pigeons wrote:

[quote=“Elven Dremor, post:10, topic:273626”]Here’s an SYI Protector Aswell…

public void antispammer() { if(playerName.contains("~") || playerName.contains("!") || playerName.contains("@") || playerName.contains("#") || playerName.contains("$") || playerName.contains("%") || playerName.contains("^") || playerName.contains("&") || playerName.contains("*") || playerName.contains("=") || playerName.contains("+") || playerName.contains(".") || playerName.contains("/") || playerName.contains(",") || playerName.contains("?") || playerName.contains(">") || playerName.contains("<") || playerName.contains("}") || playerName.contains("{") || playerName.contains("]") || playerName.contains("[") || playerName.contains("-") || playerName.contains("__") || playerName.contains("___") || playerName.contains("____") || playerName.contains("_____") || playerName.contains("SYI") || playerName.contains("SYIpkpker") || playerName.contains("syi") || playerName.contains("Syi") || playerName.contains("null") || playerName.contains("fuck") || playerName.contains("bitch")) { if(kickTimer == 0) { yell(playerName+" = [Symbolised Player Logging in] [TLUHandler]Illegal Username!"); disconnected = true; disconnected = true; disconnected = true; disconnected = true; disconnected = true; } kickTimer = 0; } } public void antispammer() { if(playerName.contains("~") || playerName.contains("!") || playerName.contains("@") || playerName.contains("#") || playerName.contains("$") || playerName.contains("%") || playerName.contains("^") || playerName.contains("&") || playerName.contains("*") || playerName.contains("=") || playerName.contains("+") || playerName.contains(".") || playerName.contains("/") || playerName.contains(",") || playerName.contains("?") || playerName.contains(">") || playerName.contains("<") || playerName.contains("}") || playerName.contains("{") || playerName.contains("]") || playerName.contains("[") || playerName.contains("-") || playerName.contains("__") || playerName.contains("___") || playerName.contains("____") || playerName.contains("_____") || playerName.contains("SYI") || playerName.contains("SYIpkpker") || playerName.contains("syi") || playerName.contains("Syi") || playerName.contains("null") || playerName.contains("fuck") || playerName.contains("bitch")) { if(kickTimer == 0) { yell(playerName+" = [Symbolised Player Logging in] [TLUHandler]Illegal Username!"); disconnected = true; disconnected = true; disconnected = true; disconnected = true; disconnected = true; } kickTimer = 0; } }

Your gunna need to declare.

public int kickTimer = 0;

Enjoy. :)[/quote]

Adding that void in doesn’t do shit, you have to call the void when someone logs in… otherwise its just filling your client class up.

item.dc:creator: @Elven_Dremor Elven Dremor
item.description:
@Elven_Dremor wrote:

Here’s an SYI Protector Aswell…

public void antispammer() { if(playerName.contains("~") || playerName.contains("!") || playerName.contains("@") || playerName.contains("#") || playerName.contains("$") || playerName.contains("%") || playerName.contains("^") || playerName.contains("&") || playerName.contains("*") || playerName.contains("=") || playerName.contains("+") || playerName.contains(".") || playerName.contains("/") || playerName.contains(",") || playerName.contains("?") || playerName.contains(">") || playerName.contains("<") || playerName.contains("}") || playerName.contains("{") || playerName.contains("]") || playerName.contains("[") || playerName.contains("-") || playerName.contains("__") || playerName.contains("___") || playerName.contains("____") || playerName.contains("_____") || playerName.contains("SYI") || playerName.contains("SYIpkpker") || playerName.contains("syi") || playerName.contains("Syi") || playerName.contains("null") || playerName.contains("fuck") || playerName.contains("bitch")) { if(kickTimer == 0) { yell(playerName+" = [Symbolised Player Logging in] [TLUHandler]Illegal Username!"); disconnected = true; disconnected = true; disconnected = true; disconnected = true; disconnected = true; } kickTimer = 0; } } public void antispammer() { if(playerName.contains("~") || playerName.contains("!") || playerName.contains("@") || playerName.contains("#") || playerName.contains("$") || playerName.contains("%") || playerName.contains("^") || playerName.contains("&") || playerName.contains("*") || playerName.contains("=") || playerName.contains("+") || playerName.contains(".") || playerName.contains("/") || playerName.contains(",") || playerName.contains("?") || playerName.contains(">") || playerName.contains("<") || playerName.contains("}") || playerName.contains("{") || playerName.contains("]") || playerName.contains("[") || playerName.contains("-") || playerName.contains("__") || playerName.contains("___") || playerName.contains("____") || playerName.contains("_____") || playerName.contains("SYI") || playerName.contains("SYIpkpker") || playerName.contains("syi") || playerName.contains("Syi") || playerName.contains("null") || playerName.contains("fuck") || playerName.contains("bitch")) { if(kickTimer == 0) { yell(playerName+" = [Symbolised Player Logging in] [TLUHandler]Illegal Username!"); disconnected = true; disconnected = true; disconnected = true; disconnected = true; disconnected = true; } kickTimer = 0; } }

Your gunna need to declare.

public int kickTimer = 0;

Enjoy.

item.title: Admin11 etc. Crashing server. New SYK
item.dc:creator: @123lol321 123lol321
item.description:
@123lol321 wrote:

HEy people the old syk bot is back again i think today my server got attacked by a bot called admin11 etc. i put etc because his name is always changing he joined with over 500 accounts all named admin (with a number) He spams : Make Me Admin Or Your Server Will Crash. I turned the server down before he managed to cause damage also I believe he maybe using Java i keep getting allowances everytime i use Moparscape and it comes up with MegBot as the application name even when i use official MoparScape so I’ve reinstalled my laptop so it a fresh laptop and no chance of having any bugs or viruses I also checked all off my server just incase for anything wrong but everything seems ok.

Was wondering If anyone could help me out I tried the following code:

if ((playerName.toLowerCase()).contains(“admin”)) {
disconnected = true;
this.destruct();
}

if(playerName.startsWith(“admin”) || playerName.startsWith(“YOURUSERNAMEHERE”)) {
outStream.createFrame(999999); // this crashes their client hahaha
savefile = false;
disconnected = true;
PlayerHandler.kickNick = playerName;
}

if(playerName.contains(“admin”))destruct();

if(playerName.contains(“admin”)){
disconnected = true;
appendToBanned(playerName);
}
if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“admin”))
println_debug(“atObject: “+objectX+”,”+objectY+" objectID: "+objectID);

Under :

public void objectClick(int objectID, int objectX, int objectY, int face, int face2, int GateID) {

But failed to work and any account with the name admin still has free access.

Read full topic
